name: Mushfiqah Alam
headline: Strategic Marketer | MSc Strategic Marketing | Global Growth & Brand Specialist

about.description-short: Purpose-driven marketer with 3+ years of global experience in HealthTech, sustainability, and digital strategy. Currently pursuing her MSc at Imperial College London.
about.description: Purpose-driven marketer blending global experience in HealthTech, sustainability, and digital strategy. With 3+ years of cross-market expertise across India, Japan, and the Philippines, she’s currently pursuing her MSc in Strategic Marketing at Imperial College London. From building impactful TikTok campaigns to co-founding a fashion resale startup, she thrives at the intersection of creativity and data.

work_experience.title: Global Marketing Consultant, Instalimb India Pvt Ltd.
Deputy Group Manager, B2C Global Marketing, Instalimb India Pvt Ltd.
Marketing Officer, Instalimb India Pvt Ltd.
Marketing and Sales Assistant, Instalimb Inc. (Tokyo)

projects.title: Curated Findings
projects.description: Co-founded India’s first online fashion resale platform, developing sustainability-led niche strategies, leading to a 120% sales increase and a customer base of 1500+.

projects.title: Philippines TikTok Channel for Health-Tech
projects.description: Launched and scaled TikTok as a health-tech marketing channel, achieving 30k+ followers and establishing a new growth stream in the Philippines market.
